description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Life Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Life Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAid0000000]{Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBeaconOfHo]{Beacon of Hope}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRevivify00]{Revivify}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAuraOfLife]{Aura of Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMassCureWo]{Mass Cure Wounds}
